historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-371, see notes under § 2-351.01.

DC CODE § 2-354.10

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The CPO may procure goods or services through a General Services Administration schedule pursuant to 40 U.S.C. § 502(a)(3) and 40 U.S.C. § 602(c).
The CPO shall ensure that the price of any contract entered into under subsection (a) of this section is reasonable.
